companyName: Seber Bulger Law - Beverly Hills, CA
description:
At Seber Bulger Law in Beverly Hills, California, our goal is to help injured people and their families recover the compensation they deserve in incidents involving negligence. Personal injuries often cause emotional trauma as well as physical, and our law firm team understands that the stress of financial worries can make an already difficult situation even worse.

We seek to hold the responsible parties liable for maximum damages, including medical bills, pain and suffering, lost past and future wages, lost earning potential, loss of consortium and other damages to give our clients a better chance at recovering their previous quality of life. Our law firm takes cases involving the following:

  • Assault and battery - plaintiff, sexual abuse, domestic violence and neglect
  • Car, trucking and transportation accidents
  • Construction accidents and asbestos/mesothelioma cases
  • Medical malpractice, birth injuries, dangerous drugs and faulty medical devices
  • Motor vehicle defects
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Personal injury, brain injury, disability and wrongful death
  • Premises liability and animal bites
  • Whistleblower-qui tam and sexual harassment

Our law firm offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments so that clients can share their stories at their convenience, and we accept credit cards, as well. Seber Bulger Law provides a compassionate ear, knowledgeable advice and fierce representation to our clients, tailoring a unique strategy for each case we handle.
